examples: The food looks good.
Save some food for me.
Food went missing from the school cafeteria?
The leaves of Morus alba are commonly used as food.
Spiders can live for several days without food.
words.defineEn: things that people and animals eat, such as meat or vegetables
words.defineVi: những thứ mà con người và động vật ăn, chẳng hạn như thịt hoặc rau

examples: A new law is proposed to curb this type of blatantly dishonest description, and not before time
The notice must be served upon the tenant and include a legal description of the breach they have committed.
What a pain writing good grant descriptions can be if you don't know where to begin.
Link description to that one too.
Mathematical string theories suggest descriptions of this unification, in addition to a fundamental structure for sub-atomic quarks and electrons.
words.defineEn: a written or oral piece intended to give a mental image of something
words.defineVi: một bài viết hoặc bằng miệng nhằm đưa ra một hình ảnh tinh thần của một cái gì đó

examples: The atmosphere was terrific.
"Trees are terrific!"
Their theories had a terrific run.
That sounds terrific.
You're terrific.
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tuyệt vời và tuyệt vời

examples: The team took a terrible beating.
You've made a terrible mess of this job.
I had terrible butterflies before I gave that talk in Venice.
The situation was terrible, but like many politicians he was attracted by troubled waters.
The entire region has been in the grip of a terrible drought.
words.defineVi: rất xấu, khó chịu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The food looks good.
The garden looks nice.
Her father looked unhappy.
The house looks east.
words.defineEn: to turn our eyes toward a person or thing that we want to see
words.defineVi: để hướng mắt về phía một người hoặc vật mà chúng ta muốn nhìn thấy

examples: The paneer curry smells amazing!
We smelled the strong scent of coconut in the air.
The smell of the burgers on the grill made Jake's mouth water.
The kitchen was filled with the smell of garlic.
She wrinkled her nose at the strong smell.
words.defineEn: to emit a particular odor or scent
words.defineVi: để phát ra một mùi đặc biệt hoặc mùi hương

examples: The chef tasted the sauce with a small spoon.
The pith of the citrus fruit added a bitter taste to the juice.
The sauce would kill the taste of the herbs.
Too much garlic killed the taste of the meat.
The cake tasted so good that everyone wanted a second slice.
words.defineVi: để có một hương vị cụ thể

examples: The spicy beef jerky left a smoky aftertaste in my mouth.
Spicy food doesn't sit well with me.
The spicy sausage and mushroom fusilli had a nice kick of flavor.
He prepared a spicy chicken roll, with seasoned chicken, jalapeños, and a kick of hot sauce.
I hate spicy food because it burns my mouth.
words.defineEn: having a strong taste that gives your mouth a pleasant burning feeling
words.defineVi: có hương vị mạnh mang lại cho miệng bạn cảm giác bỏng rát dễ chịu

examples: Salty oceans breezes.
So saltier water is denser than fresher water.
- Is it salty?
- It's salty.
This is salty.
words.defineEn: containing salt or having a taste that is like salt
words.defineVi: chứa muối hoặc có vị giống như muối

examples: Sour cherry compote is the perfect topping for pancakes or waffles.
The sour gourd pickle had a delightful combination of tanginess and spiciness.
He's as sour as vinegar.
You definitely struck a sour note when you brought up Dan's ex-girlfriends during your best man speech.
If you leave milk out in a warm place, it will go sour.
words.defineEn: having a sharp acidic taste like lemon
words.defineVi: có vị chua gắt như chanh

examples: My grandmother kept chickens in her back yard.
My grandfather used to raise chickens on his farm.
The chicken laid an egg in the nesting box.
The farmer fed the chickens with corn and grains.
My grandma makes the best homemade chicken soup.
words.defineEn: the flesh of a chicken that is used as food
words.defineVi: thịt của một con gà được sử dụng làm thực phẩm

examples: The wool feels soft.
The soft rug in the living room adds warmth to the space.
The full moon cast a soft glow on the landscape.
The soft carpet feels nice under my feet.
As the Camembert matured, the cheese rind turned soft and bloomy.
words.defineEn: easily changing shape when touched; not firm or hard to the touch
words.defineVi: dễ dàng thay đổi hình dạng khi chạm vào; không cứng hoặc khó chạm vào

examples: This disaster comes hard on the heels of last week’s train crash.
The kids always work hard at school.
For Walter, disaster followed hard on the heels of his initial success.
Life on the road can be very hard.
She worked hard toward her degree.
words.defineEn: not easily cut, bent, or broken; firm and solid
words.defineVi: không dễ bị cắt, uốn cong hoặc gãy; vững chắc và vững chắc

examples: She baked a batch of wholesome wholemeal cookies, combining oats, nuts, and dried fruits for a chewy and nutritious treat.
The vegan gummy candies used a plant-based gelling agent to achieve a chewy and gel-like consistency.
He mixed pastry flour with water and yeast to create a soft and chewy pizza dough.
Dried berries are convenient and provide a satisfying chewy texture.
Hard flour, known for its high protein content, is ideal for baking breads that require a strong structure and a chewy texture.
words.defineEn: (of food) requiring to be chewed a lot in order to be swallowed easily
words.defineVi: (đồ ăn) phải nhai nhiều mới nuốt được

examples: They use cereal as a crunchy topping for their homemade ice cream sundaes.
She tossed mustard sprouts into her salad for a crunchy texture and a hint of spiciness.
She accidentally grabbed the onion instead of the apple from the fruit bowl and took a crunchy bite.
The restaurant offered a refreshing salad with a mix of leafy greens and crunchy vegetables.
We sat around the picnic blanket, passing a bowl of filberts, enjoying their crunchy texture.
words.defineEn: (of food) firm and making a sharp sound when bitten
words.defineVi: (của thực phẩm) chắc và phát ra âm thanh chói tai khi cắn
